content: Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Mar 2019Anyone bought their house furnitures / lightings from JB before? Can you share the vendor + process and how much you managed to save?2 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Kenneth Lou, Co-founder at SeedlyLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 15 Mar 2019We wanted to buy 3 x matteress from JB which were made in Malaysia but under a reputable brand... I think it was Serta or something. But at the end of the day, because we were getting them to transport it over to SG, there was an import tax which needed to be paid.Thus we did not go ahead with it in the end! But that is for the matteress, so I'm not entirely sure about other stuff like Sofa etc.0 comments0

Han Jinyuan Larry, Senior Lifeguard at CertisLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 15 Mar 2019If you have transport, you can save 2/3 due to the currency conversion. The seller usually ask for model number or an image of the item you are seeking.0 comments0
